verses.roman:
āsi' vidyā-vācaspatira gṛhete rahilā
prabhure dekhite loka-saṅghaṭṭa ha-ilā

synonyms: āsi'-coming to Bengal; vidyā-vācaspatira—of Vidyā-vācaspati; gṛhete—at the home; rahilā—remained; prabhure—unto Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhite—to see; loka-saṅghaṭṭa—crowds of men; ha-ilā—there were.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu reached Vidyānagara, Bengal, on the way to Vṛndāvana, He stopped at the house of Vidyā-vācaspati, who was the brother of Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya. When Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu suddenly arrived at his house, great crowds of people gathered.
